definition: crude but simple methods (idiom); use whatever methods you can/to do things simply and thriftily/It's not pretty but it works.

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: They should do things simply and economically, practising economy and working hard with perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 要提倡因陋就简，经济节约，艰苦奋斗。

sentences.english: The teachers made do with what was available and built a small activity room for the children.
sentences.chinese: 老师们因陋就简，给孩子们建了一个小活动室。

sentences.english: In diet can roughing it, and it is not of learning.
sentences.chinese: 穿着饮食可以因陋就简，而搞学问是不能因陋就简的。

sentences.english: In diet can roughing it, and it is not of learning.
sentences.chinese: 穿着饮食可以因陋就简，而搞学问是不能因陋就简的。

definition: to draw on local resources/using materials at hand
to apply mechanically/to copy and use
lit. earthen steps and a small cottage/frugal living conditions (idiom)
The cleverest housewife cannot cook without rice (idiom); You won't get anywhere without equipment.
pinyin: qiao3 fu4 nan2 wei2 wu2 mi3 zhi1 chui1

definition: combining native and foreign methods (idiom); sophisticated and many-sided
